Icathian Surprise.name: Icathian Surprise
Icathian Surprise.blurb: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.
Icathian Surprise.description: Innate: Upon taking fatal damage, Kog'Maw remains active for 4 seconds, becoming  pacified,  invulnerable,  untargetable and gaining up to  40% bonus movement speed over the duration. He then explodes, dealing 125 − 550 (based on level)  true damage to all nearby enemies.
Icathian Surprise.notes:
* Upon triggering Icathian Surprise, Kog'Maw is cleansed of all debuffs and effects that do not inherently persist through death.
 An example for a debuff that does persist through death is  Brand's  Blaze.

  Guardian Angel and  Chronoshift will take precedence over Icathian Surprise.
 Possible Bug: Dying while affected by  Chronoshift allows Kog'Maw to trigger Icathian Surprise immediately and then a second time right after he revives.

 After Icathian Surprise ends, the corpse of Kog'Maw will retain body block for the duration of his death animation.
 If Kog'Maw has an auto attack in the air at the same time that he's moving while he dies, as long as the auto hits the target after Icathian Surprise has started Kog'Maw will be able to auto once during Icathian Surprise.

Caustic Spittle.name: Caustic Spittle
Caustic Spittle.blurb: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
Caustic Spittle.description: Passive: Kog'Maw gains  bonus attack speed.
Caustic Spittle.description2: Active: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive  projectile in a target direction, dealing  magic damage to the first enemy it hits and  ‎ ‎reducing their  armor and  magic resistance for 4 seconds.

Bio-Arcane Barrage.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
Bio-Arcane Barrage.blurb: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
Bio-Arcane Barrage.description: Active: For the next 8 seconds, Kog'Maw's basic attacks gain  bonus range and deal bonus magic damage on-hit, capped at 100 against  minions and  monsters.
Bio-Arcane Barrage.leveling:
Bonus Range:
130 / 150 / 170 / 190 / 210

Bonus Magic Damage:
3 / 3.75 / 4.5 / 5.25 / 6% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
Bio-Arcane Barrage.notes: * The enhanced attacks will apply other on-hit effects and can  critically strike as normal but does not affect structures.

Void Ooze.name: Void Ooze
Void Ooze.blurb: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
Void Ooze.description: Active: Kog'Maw spews a ball of ooze in the target direction, dealing magic damage and  slowing enemies for 1 second.
Void Ooze.description2: The ooze lingers for 4 seconds,  slowing all enemies within the area for an additional 0.25 seconds.

Living Artillery.name: Living Artillery
Living Artillery.blurb: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
Living Artillery.description: Active: Kog'Maw launches a ball of acid into the air that drops after 0.6 seconds at the target location, dealing magic damage, increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health), and  revealing enemies hit for 2 seconds.
Living Artillery.leveling:
Magic Damage:
100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 (+ 65% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP)
Increased Magic Damage:
150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 (+ 97.5% bonus AD) (+ 37.5% AP)
Maximum Magic Damage:
200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 (+ 130% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP)
Living Artillery.description2: Living Artillery's damage is doubled against enemies below  40% maximum health. Each subsequent Living Artillery within the next 8 seconds costs an additional  40 mana, capping at  400 per cast.
Living Artillery.notes:
* On cast Living Artillery grants slight  sight of the target area.
 Living Artillery will not reveal stealthed champions (can still damage them).
